name: Awake (itch)
description:
Mouse looks / WASD or Arrows move / Spacebar jumps

Explore an abandoned city of existential dread and FM synthesis. Inspired by cyberpunk / cosmic horror / and this tutorial.

Headphones recommended.

Enjoy!

** 06/27/16 - Added untested Windows and Linux builds. Let me know if they work!

** 12/14/16: Changed to Unity Web GL from outdated Unity Web Player.
